title: A No-Go Theorem for {\psi}-ontic Models? Yes! Response to Criticisms
authors: Gabriele Carcassi, Andrea Oldofredi, Christine A. Aidala
abstract:
This short note addresses the criticisms recently proposed by Shan Gao
against our article "On the Reality of the Quantum State Once Again: A No-Go
Theorem for {\psi}-Ontic Models" (Found. Phys. 54:14). The essay aims to
respond to such objections and to show once again that the theorem proved in
our paper is correct, and therefore true - contrary to Gao's claims.
Philosophical consequences of this fact are briefly discussed.
